alert.note: Alert for Berkeley; Hampshire (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 25 at 1:23PM EDT until September 25 at 1:45PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN SHENANDOAH...FREDERICK...NORTH CENTRAL WARREN AND NORTHWESTERN CLARKE COUNTIES IN NORTHWESTERN VIRGINIA...SOUTH CENTRAL BERKELEY COUNTY IN THE PANHANDLE OF WEST VIRGINIA AND SOUTHEASTERN HAMPSHIRE COUNTIES IN EASTERN WEST VIRGINIA AND THE CITY OF WINCHESTER... At 123 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles southwest of Greenwood to near Star Tannery, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. Locations impacted include... Winchester, Strasburg, Millwood Pike, Stephens City, Star Tannery, Middletown, High View, Cedar Grove, Clear Brook, Stephenson, Cross Junction, Cedar Hill, Nineveh, Albin, Gore, Clary, Brucetown, Gravel Springs, Greenwood and High View Manor. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
